attributes.action: Allow Dr Zamboni's CCSVI liberation Procedure for MS sufferers to be pacticed by in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: You will need to provide more information about the treatment you refer to, and issues with its practice in the UK.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
